001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024import java.util.stream.Stream;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028public final class MapFind {
029  @NonNull
030  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
031      .name("find")
032      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
033      .deterministic()
034      .contextIndependent()
035      .focusIndependent()
036      .argument(IArgument.builder()
037          .name("input")
038          .type(IItem.class)
039          .zeroOrMore()
040          .build())
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("key")
043          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
047      .returnOne()
048      .functionHandler(MapFind::execute)
049      .build();
050
051  private MapFind() {
052    // disable construction
053  }
054
055  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
056  @NonNull
057  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
058      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
059      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
060      IItem focus) {
061    ISequence<?> input = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
062    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
063
064    return ISequence.of(IArrayItem.ofCollection(
065        ObjectUtils.notNull(find((Collection<? extends IItem>) input, key)
066            .collect(Collectors.toList()))));
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
071   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
072   *
073   * @param items
074   *          the item sequence to search for key matches
075   * @param key
076   *          the key for the item to retrieve
077   * @return the retrieved item
078   */
079  @NonNull
080  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
081      @NonNull Collection<? extends IItem> items,
082      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
083    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
084        // handle item
085        .flatMap(item -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(item), key)));
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
090   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
091   *
092   * @param item
093   *          the item to search for key matches
094   * @param key
095   *          the key for the item to retrieve
096   * @return the retrieved item
097   */
098  @NonNull
099  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
100      @NonNull IItem item,
101      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
102    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
103    if (item instanceof IArrayItem) {
104      IArrayItem<?> array = (IArrayItem<?>) item;
105      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(array.stream()
106          // handle array values
107          .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key)));
108    } else if (item instanceof IMapItem) {
109      IMapItem<?> map = (IMapItem<?>) item;
110      // handle map
111      retval = find(map, key);
112    } else {
113      // do nothing
114      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.empty());
115    }
116    return retval;
117  }
118
119  @NonNull
120  private static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
121      @NonNull ICollectionValue value,
122      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
123    Stream<ICollectionValue> retval;
124    if (value instanceof ISequence) {
125      ISequence<?> sequence = (ISequence<?>) value;
126      // handle sequence items
127      retval = find((Collection<? extends IItem>) sequence, key);
128    } else {
129      // handle item
130      retval = find((IItem) value, key);
131    }
132    return retval;
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
137   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-find">map:find</a>.
138   * <p>
139   * This is a specialized method for processing an item that is a map item, which
140   * can be searched for a key in a much more efficient way.
141   *
142   * @param item
143   *          the item to search for key matches
144   * @param key
145   *          the key for the item to retrieve
146   * @return the retrieved item
147   */
148  @NonNull
149  public static Stream<ICollectionValue> find(
150      @NonNull IMapItem<?> item,
151      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
152    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(
153        // add matching value, if it exists
154        Stream.ofNullable(MapGet.get(item, key)),
155        item.values().stream()
156            // handle map values
157            .flatMap(value -> find(ObjectUtils.notNull(value), key))));
158  }
159}
